news.title: Sister Ghost announces Ireland and UK tour dates
Anna Fitzgerald wins John McGahern Prize for Debut Irish Fiction
news.summary: The award will be presented to Fitzgerald at the Liverpool Literary Festival on October 19.

news.title: Blue Slate release new single 'Plastic Soul'
news.summary: They have announced an Irish tour with three Dublin dates and one show in Galway in September.

news.title: An Garda Síochána - A Job Worth Doing: Build Your Career. Serve Your Community.
news.summary: With evolving roles and lasting respect, An Garda Síochána remains one of the country’s most valued professions.

news.title: Former Hot Press Art Director Paula T. Nolan wins Creative Sustainability Award
news.summary: For her winning project ReViewing Ireland, Nolan travelled across all 26 counties of the Republic of Ireland over the course of a year, using only an e-bike and public transport.

news.title: ICE places Irish grandmother in U.S. isolation cell over $25 cheque written ten years ago
news.summary: "She’s been in this country 47 years, is married, with five kids and five grandkids, and you’re telling me she’s a flight risk?" said Donna's husband Jim.

news.title: Gemma Hayes to kick off Irish tour this month
news.summary: Tickets for her Irish tour are on sale now.

news.title: Above & Beyond announce their return to Belfast with headline show
news.summary: The Belfast gig is the only Irish date announced so far.

news.title: Whitney announce headline Dublin show
news.summary: Check out their new single ‘Back To The Wind’.

news.title: Catherine Connolly: "I think we have to unite. We’re a tiny country. We should have never been divided"
news.summary: Read the full interview in the current issue of Hot Press, out now.
